name: twenty-object-creator
title: Twenty Object Creator
description: Create new records for any object in Twenty directly from Raycast. Easily interact with your Twenty objects without leaving your workflow.
author: yash_parmar

commands.name: create-new-record
commands.title: Create New Record
commands.subtitle: Fill in the details to create a record in Twenty.
commands.description: Quickly create a new record for any object in your Twenty instance directly from Raycast.

commands.name: list-all-records
commands.title: List All Records
commands.subtitle: View all records in a grid for easy management
commands.description: List and Manage records of any object from your twenty crm inside raycast.

preferences.name: twentyApiKey
preferences.title: Twenty API Key
preferences.description: Your Twenty API Key. You can find this when you generate a new API key at https://app.twenty.com/settings/api

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
